Attributes.description: A survey of basic terminology, methods, problems, and theoretical trends in French linguistics, specifically designed to provide students with a foundation for advanced language study in French.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) FREN 223 or (b) all of FREN 352, FREN 401.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 13:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D301
